suppress.notes:
Spring Security 5.4.x prior to 5.4.4, 5.3.x prior to 5.3.8.RELEASE, 5.2.x prior to 5.2.9.RELEASE, and older unsupported versions can fail to save the SecurityContext if it is changed more than once in a single request
https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-22112 Temporary suppression until upgrade to Spring Boot 2.4.x

https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-1000190 SimpleXML (latest version 2.7.1) is vulnerable to an XXE vulnerability resulting SSRF, information disclosure, DoS and so on.
